price: 162. Yallak kacanuu kee leeda edde tanim kataate num kee Yallih Amri cineeh kay naqabu cakkisiteeh kasaara luk gacey jahannam gira orbeyna kak tekke numih inna maay kinni? Hinna, jahannam gira is manxu uma gacsimeynaay!
arabic: أَفَمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ رِضۡوَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ كَمَنۢ بَآءَ بِسَخَطٖ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَمَأۡوَىٰهُ جَهَنَّمُۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: afamani ittabaʿa riḍ'wāna al-lahi kaman bāa bisakhaṭin mina al-lahi wamawāhu jahannamu wabi'sa al-maṣīru
